 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָלְעָם‎</span> **noun masculine** ==an edible, winged, locust== (Late Hebrew ***id.; swallower, consumer***, compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַלְעֵם‎</span> ***swallow up, destroy***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> verb ***swallow***, [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1, 404</sup>); — [[Lev.11.22|Lev 11:22]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְבֶּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַרְגֹּל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַגָב‎</span>).
